body:
Comment 4 by **captain.pineapple**: 
The vsyscall address still appears to be there in /proc/sys/maps:

[ckh@lra13119-f17 src]$ cat /proc/self/maps 
00400000-0040b000 r-xp 00000000 fd:01 145424                             /usr/bin/cat
0060a000-0060b000 r--p 0000a000 fd:01 145424                             /usr/bin/cat
0060b000-0060c000 rw-p 0000b000 fd:01 145424                             /usr/bin/cat
00c82000-00ca3000 rw-p 00000000 00:00 0                                  [heap]
3cfea00000-3cfea20000 r-xp 00000000 fd:01 161908                        
/usr/lib64/ld-2.15.so
3cfec1f000-3cfec20000 r--p 0001f000 fd:01 161908                        
/usr/lib64/ld-2.15.so
3cfec20000-3cfec21000 rw-p 00020000 fd:01 161908                        
/usr/lib64/ld-2.15.so
3cfec21000-3cfec22000 rw-p 00000000 00:00 0 
3cfee00000-3cfefac000 r-xp 00000000 fd:01 162636                        
/usr/lib64/libc-2.15.so
3cfefac000-3cff1ac000 ---p 001ac000 fd:01 162636                        
/usr/lib64/libc-2.15.so
3cff1ac000-3cff1b0000 r--p 001ac000 fd:01 162636                        
/usr/lib64/libc-2.15.so
3cff1b0000-3cff1b2000 rw-p 001b0000 fd:01 162636                        
/usr/lib64/libc-2.15.so
3cff1b2000-3cff1b7000 rw-p 00000000 00:00 0 
7ffeb9786000-7ffebfbb3000 r--p 00000000 fd:01 169793                    
/usr/lib/locale/locale-archive
7ffebfbb3000-7ffebfbb6000 rw-p 00000000 00:00 0 
7ffebfbc8000-7ffebfbc9000 rw-p 00000000 00:00 0 
7fff90d5d000-7fff90d7e000 rw-p 00000000 00:00 0                          [stack]
7fff90dff000-7fff90e00000 r-xp 00000000 00:00 0                          [vdso]
ffffffffff600000-ffffffffff601000 r-xp 00000000 00:00 0                  [vsyscall]
